name: Hospital Preparedness Program (HPP) Ebola Preparedness and Response Activities
objective: This program covers two separate, but related projects: Part A – Health Care System Preparedness for Ebola and Part B – Development of a Regional Network for Ebola Patient Care. The purpose of this program is to (1) improve healthcare system preparedness for Ebola and (2) develop a regional hospital network for Ebola patient care.
top_agency_name: Department of Health and Human Services
sub_agency_name: ADMINISTRATION FOR STRATEGIC PREPAREDNESS AND RESPONSE

authorizations.text: VI, 311, Title VI of Division G of the Consolidated and Continuing Appropriations Act, 2015 and Public Health Service Act, Section 311 (42 U.S.C. 243).
